items.value: Hey! Press the button at the back of the controller. (Trigger)
Great, this way you can advance the text and interact with things.
If you push the control stick forward you can teleport after this tutorial.
Please push the control stick forward with your thumb now once.
Aim with the ray on your controller at the letters...
and press the trigger to click a letter.
Ok! After this, move to the center of the room, to select a room to go to.
There is a sculpture that you can interact with.
After you selected a room, a door will open at the walls.
You then have to go trough that door. Have fun now!
